title: News Story Reaction
alt: Unless the next line is, "After we broke up, she blamed the painting and spent years planning her revenge, so my sorrow is mixed with relief that the dogs at least denied her that triumph."
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a desk, typing something on a laptop.]
Cueball: Devastated to hear that a pack of wild dogs got into the Louvre and shredded the Mona Lisa.
Cueball: What a loss for humanity.
Cueball: My First kiss was in the aisle of a J.C. Penny that had a poster of the Mona Lisa on the wall, so this is hitting me especially hard.[Underneath the panel]
Cueball: Sometimes I have to remind myself not to make every news story about me.
